QuestData.Title: Faces of Evil
QuestData.Description: The Vilebranch have hung their tiki masks all across the walls of Jintha'Alor. We won't tolerate their foul hexes and dark magic.$B$BIt's time to send a message, and tear down their defenses, all at once! Take this torch, $c. Set fire to their tiki masks and watch 'em burn. They'll know the Wildhammer want them gone when they see their dark idols consumed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Tiki Torch to set fire to 8 Tiki Masks at Jintha'Alor.
QuestData.RewardText: The elements dance, and fire consumes. Let the flame show 'em the cost of their wickedness!
